QuestData.Title: Nespirah
QuestData.Description: It is clear to me at this point what must be done, $n.$b$bThe naga can only be obtaining these pearls from one place: Nespirah, the ancient, shelled creature that rests outside of this cave. Why Nespirah would submit to the naga, however, is beyond my understanding.$b$bWe can enter Nespirah's body cavity through a small tube near the exit to this cave. I must first fetch my master, then we can meet you on the inside. We will convene in Nespirah's northwestern entrance.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Find a way to communicate with Nespirah
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Nespirah's northwestern entrance, then find a way to communicate with it.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Earthmender Duarn inside Nespirah in Vashj'ir.
QuestData.RewardText: Erunak trusts this task to me? Very well, let's see what we can learn from the ancient one.
